page.title: 06Basingstoke Crabtree Centre
page.content: It was Saturday 13th March. We arrived for a three day stay. After pitching our{tents}we went in to the woods to have a go on the aerial runway which is a seat pulled to the top of a tree by a pulley. Next we went on the{ {monkey}bridge which is two pieces of rope put from one tree to another and then you go across. Next thing was we had lunch after which we were told to go into the woods and make a{den}for four people and to stay there for an hour and write down the things we heard. Then we had our open ceremony at the {camp}after which we had cocoa and chocolate cake.Then we washed and went to bed. Next morning after breakfast we entered a{five mile hike,}had lunch, and then played{tennis}and {40_40 in(A game).}After tea we took the flag down and went to bed.
